description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=2/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=1/3. Mortal Legacies is a 2D Japanese Role Playing Game. Explore the world of Elisia in search of the lost crown while fighting powerful foes and finding friends to help you on your quest.
description.short: Mortal Legacies is a 2D Japanese Role Playing Game. Explore the world of Elisia in search of the lost crown while fighting powerful foes and finding friends to help you on your quest.
